subject: Re: [junit] How to Test Private Methods Inside a Class
msgSnippet: ... My standard approach is to move the methods I feel need direct testing into classes where they want to be public, and then test them as usual. What do
messageBody:
> I am struck where I have to test some private methods inside a class.
> Situation is like that, inside my class all methods are private except
> one through which we access the service.
>
> I welcome any ideas in this regards.

My standard approach is to move the methods I feel need direct testing
into classes where they want to be public, and then test them as usual.

What do those private methods do? Can you give an example?

Cheers, Ilja
